introduction.description: I am a trusted mobile developer with 8+ years of experience in Flutter and cross-platform development. I started in IT support at WIT Solutions before transitioning to development, working with PhoneGap, JavaScript, and PHP. I contributed to a Xamarin startup and played a key role in Liberty Mutual’s Aliro project using C# MVC 5. In 2018, I specialized in Xamarin Forms, earning certifications and leading an ASP.NET migration. After studying English in Ireland (B2 PET Cambridge), I focused on Flutter, taking Tech Lead roles at Camino Education and ArcTouch, delivering high-quality Android and iOS applications.

job.title: Job Experience
job.description: I have 8+ years of experience in web and mobile development, specializing in Flutter. I’ve worked with ArcTouch, Camino Education, Yamaha Group, Safra Bank, and Liberty Mutual, using technologies like Kotlin, Swift, C#, and JavaScript.

youtube.title: Youtube Channel
youtube.description: I co-founded Pub Dev, a YouTube channel focused on Flutter development, where I create content to simplify complex topics. Teaching is something I enjoy, whether mentoring developers or creating tutorials, as it helps others grow while reinforcing my own knowledge.
